item.title: Kris add a quote by Sandra Gulland
item.description: "He calls me Josephine. He says I'm an angel, a saint, his good lucky star. I know I'm no angel, but in truth I have begun to like this Josephine he sees. She is intelligent; she amuses; she is pleasing. She is grace and charm and heart. Unlike Rose; scared, haunted and needy. Unlike Rose with her sad life." -- Sandra Gulland

item.title: Kris add a quote by Marion Zimmer Bradley
item.description: "There is no such thing as a true tale. Truth has many faces and the truth is like to the old road to Avalon; it depends on your own will, and your own thoughts, whither the road will take you." -- Marion Zimmer Bradley

item.title: Kris add a quote by Napoleon Bonaparte
item.description: "Show me a family of readers, and I will show you the people who move the world." -- Napoleon Bonaparte
